website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and nicely put together, with a retro style. Its toast setting is a bit touchy, though.
pros: Toasts bread quickly and evenly, even when toasting several slices in a row
Defrost function is a nice touch
Stays in one place thanks to anti-slip feet
cons: Larger than similar toasters, taking up more counter space
Tends to run hot, requiring a few “test” pieces of toast to figure out best setting

customer_reviews.title: Well made, toastes beautifully.  Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST toaster I have ever owned! High quality made. Toast, English muffins and bagels come out evenly toasted even when having to use consecutively. High quality of manifactoring, I won't have to keep buying toasters after this one. Looks adorable in my shabby chic kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Whale

customer_reviews.title: Function meets Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful. The color is perfect, just as it appears on screen, has defrost and toast functions, and toasts my bread perfectly. It is so pretty that I am changing my kitchen decor to match my toaster. One of my friends called it the BMW of toasters. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: mkella

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster I’ve ever had. I bought the Breville toaster for $99 and the electronics stopped working in a month, and I only used it less than five times. I adore the color pink and the retro construction of this toaster. This makes PERFECT toast. Great construction and just pretty. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to all my girlfriends pink kitchen utensils
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to all my girlfriends pink kitchen utensils. Old school 50's look. Looks great, works great. Highly recommend if you in the market for a pink toaster this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! The color is perfect bubblegum pink. To be honest, I wouldn’t even be too upset if it didn’t toast that well because it is so pretty. It toasts perfectly, no complaints at all. Gorgeous and functional, what more could I ask for? I know it’s not bargain priced, but for me it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C

customer_reviews.title: but it is nothing but a pink piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. I couldn't get the handle to stay down for toasting. Even tried holding it down and nothing was working. The toaster came in a SMEG toaster box, but it was blue and looked as though it had been re-shipped several times and it wasn't even tapped shut for shipping! It is obvious this has been returned on more than one occasion, yet it is still being sold. One would think this would be a gem at the price it is going for, but it is nothing but a pink piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but the best & most beautiful toaster I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: I love my Smeg toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love my Smeg toaster! It is sturdy and toasts really fast. And the color is perfect. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clark

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful, and toasts very evenly
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks beautiful on my counter and is solidly constructed. It toasts perfectly evenly, and is very straightforward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this toaster!! It is both beautiful and functional. I can't say enough great things about this product. I am so glad I made the investment. It is WELL worth it....
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Quality in my favorite color pink.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. It is really well crafter and makes perfect toast.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: The material is very good
customer_reviews.text: The material is very good, very like, the packing is very meticulous.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Weller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, toast did burn once , set it on 3 for normal toast 💕
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Ordo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Easy to use and looks great on countertop
customer_reviews.author: Chicagotwin

customer_reviews.title: Pride in ownership
customer_reviews.text: This is not only beautiful but is made like old school- with pride of workmanship worth the extra $
customer_reviews.author: Galyn Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pink one & its adorable. Really wanted a yellow one but they don’t make a yellow one!?!?! Looks great on the counter of my newly remodeled kitchen. Unfortunately it doesn't toast toast evenly. One side is significantly darker than the other. I contacted supplier & was issued two replacements both did the same thing. Now, they don't respond to me. Prior to this expensive toaster I had a standard toaster for about 20 years. No frills but it toasted the bread evenly. I don't think that's too much to ask from a $160.00 toaster! Very cute, but not practical. It appears the quality has gone down for SMEG.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent!
customer_reviews.text: Added a pop of color exactly where I wanted it. In love with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael William

customer_reviews.title: and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: it took a while for the toaster to warm up and average out the temperature. instructions say to set to high to burn dust and reset toaster, then turn power down to use toaster regularly. first 5 times toasting, resulted in burnt toast, even when set to a power of 1. gave it a few days break, then tried again, and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde

customer_reviews.title: It's a SMEG!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pink SMEG toaster! It is the cutest thing. I can't load a picture because I'm on a different computer, but it's beautiful. It works perfectly and toasts nice. You can lift the toast easily and it's easy to clean. Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi S

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! Works perfectly and adds so much style to the kitchen. Love the bagel Button for perfectly cooked bagels! Worth every penny. Not your average toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new toaster! So cute and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Poppins

customer_reviews.title: I never knew toasted breads can taste so good. Now I can't eat breads untoasted
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I never knew toasted breads can taste so good. Now I can't eat breads untoasted.
customer_reviews.author: myrtales

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is GORGEOUS! Just what I was looking for. Perfect bubble gum pink color
customer_reviews.author: Msk8e

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Does run hot, so put it on 2.5. I get loads of complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Boo Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love my toaster! It’s so retro and rich that I want another one hahaha
customer_reviews.author: NurseDawni29

product_meta.title: Smeg 2-Slice Toaster-Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkThis Smeg Toaster's stylish Mid-century design comes in a bright selection of vintage colors. What's more, it's ultra chic and unique without compromising on functionality. Loaded with high-tech features that let you toast, defrost, and reheat everything from bagels to artisan breads, the award winning Smeg 2-Slice Toaster is constructed from steel with a polished chrome base, and stainless steel and chrome controls. Rich colorful enamel finishes are powder-coated on for the ultimate in beauty and durability. Backed by the manufacturer's 1-Year Hassle-Free Repair or Replace Warranty. Measures 12.2" l x 7.7" w x 7.8" h. Winner of the 2015 iF Design Award and Red Dot Award and recipient of the Good Design Award from the Chicago Athenaeum Museum of Architecture and Design Features of the Smeg 2 Slice Toaster Cream include:Vintage-inspired design with steel exterior and powder-coated enamels in true, mid-century colorsAward-winning line celebrates the refinement, originality, quality and advanced technology of Italian designEco-friendly toaster consumes minimal energy with maximum performanceVintage details include ball lever knob, polished chrome base, and back-lit chrome controls6 browning levels and 3 pre-set programs: reheat, defrost, bagelWide 1.4" slots with self-centering racks and automatic pop-upRemovable stainless steel crumb tray and built-in cord wrapManufacturer's 1-year Hassle-Free Repair or Replace Warranty12.2" l x 7.7" w x 7.8" h

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
